summary: Senior Full-Stack Developer with 8+ years of experience building scalable web applications and leading cross-functional teams. Passionate about clean code architecture, performance optimization, and mentoring junior developers. Proven track record of delivering high-impact projects for Fortune 500 clients.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Specialization in Distributed Systems and Machine Learning. GPA: 3.9/4.0

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering
education.description: Dean's List, Computer Science Club President

experience.description: Lead a team of 8 developers building a SaaS analytics platform serving 50K+ users. Architected microservices infrastructure reducing deployment time by 60%. Implemented real-time data pipelines processing 10M+ events daily.

Built and maintained 5 client-facing web applications using React and Node.js. Introduced automated testing pipelines improving code coverage from 40% to 92%. Mentored 4 junior developers through technical growth plans.
Developed RESTful APIs and responsive frontends for enterprise applications. Optimized database queries resulting in 45% faster page load times.

projects.name: CloudDeploy Platform
projects.description: Open-source deployment automation tool with 2.5K GitHub stars. Built with Go and React, supports AWS, GCP, and Azure.

projects.name: DataViz Dashboard
projects.description: Real-time analytics dashboard with customizable widgets and data export. Used by 3 enterprise clients.
